title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
1. Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
2. Fry pancetta until crisp.
3. Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
4. Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and mix in the egg mixture quickly to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
2. Grill or sear the chicken pieces until cooked.
3. Simmer tomato puree with spices and cream.
4. Add chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Spicy Beef Tacos
summary: Authentic Mexican street tacos with marinated beef, fresh cilantro, and zesty lime.
instructions:
1. Cook beef in a skillet with chili powder and cumin.
2. Warm tortillas in a dry pan.
3. Fill tortillas with beef.
4. Top with fresh onion, cilantro, a squeeze of lime, and salsa.

title: Fresh Sushi Roll
summary: Premium sashimi-grade fish wrapped in seasoned rice and nori with avocado.
instructions:
1. Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
2. Place nori sheet on a bamboo mat.
3. Spread rice over nori and add fish and vegetables.
4. Roll tightly using the mat, slice into pieces, and serve.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Rich and gooey molten chocolate cake served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
instructions:
1. Melt chocolate and butter together.
2. Whisk eggs and sugar until pale, then fold in flour and chocolate mix.
3. Pour into greased ramekins.
4. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 12-14 minutes until sides are set but center is jiggly.
